    • Game

      public Game()

  • Method Details

    • changeLevel

      public void changeLevel​(java.lang.String currentLevel, MainCharacter mainChar)
      This method is used to transfer the player from one level to another or launch the Level from the Menu
      Parameters:
      currentLevel - The level name the player is coming from eg. "LevelOne" will transfer to LevelTwo
      mainChar - MainCharacter object used to pass the statistics when moving between levels

    • changeLevel

      public void changeLevel​(java.lang.String levelToLoad, int health, int points, int ammo, org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 pos)
      * This method is used to set the Level world when loaded from the save file
      Parameters:
      levelToLoad - Level name that's to be loaded
      health - health of the MainCharacter should be set to
      points - score the player scored during the save
      ammo - ammo of the MainCharacter
      pos - the position of the MainCharacter

    • getFrame

      public javax.swing.JFrame getFrame()
      Returns:
      JFrame the program is set in

    • getMenu

      public MainMenu getMenu()
      Returns:
      Menu object that is used

    • getFont

      public java.awt.Font getFont()
      Returns:
      Font that the whole program uses

    • getMusicVolume

      public float getMusicVolume()
      Returns:
      float 0.0-1.0

      GameLevel object

      Returns:
      GameView object

    • setMusicVolume

      public void setMusicVolume​(float musicVolume)
      Sets the music volume
      Parameters:
      musicVolume - float from 0.0 to 1.0

    • setSfxVolume

      public void setSfxVolume​(float sfxVolume)
      Sets the sfx volume
      Parameters:
      sfxVolume - float from 0.0 to 1.0

    • frameSetter

      public void frameSetter​(GameLevel level)
      This method sets the level for view and the sets frame's view
      Parameters:
      level - the GameLevel object the frame should set to

    • soundSetter

      public void soundSetter​(GameLevel level)
      This method sets the sounds volumes for the generic class GameLevel and then every level can access them to adjust volumes in the classes they use
      Parameters:
      level - level object that user is going to play in

    • loadSaveFile

      public void loadSaveFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
      passes the path of the file to GameSaverLoader
      Parameters:
      fileName - the path of the file to load

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
